code: import React from"react";import{Tooltip,makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core";import{green,grey}from"@material-ui/core/colors";import CheckCircleIcon from"@material-ui/icons/CheckCircle";import ErrorIcon from"@material-ui/icons/Error";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const useStyles=makeStyles(theme=>({on:{color:green[600],fontSize:"20px"},off:{color:grey[600],fontSize:"20px"}}));const UserStatusIcon=_ref=>{let{user}=_ref;const classes=useStyles();if(!user||typeof user.online==="undefined"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Desconhecido",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorIcon,{className:classes.off})});}return user.online?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Online",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircleIcon,{className:classes.on})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:"Offline",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ErrorIcon,{className:classes.off})});};export default UserStatusIcon;
